title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, overlapping windows from other applications.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open two Eclipse windows. Switch from another application to one Eclipse window, then click on a docked view or perspective. The other window should come to the front, overlapping windows from other applications.
